name: Don't Go into the Light
description:
I need your help, they'll kill me if you don't. And they'll try to kill you if you try to help me. So whatever you do, don't go into the light.

Explore what's left of the world after a cataclysmic event. The Watchers were mankind's last attempt at salvaging humanity, an AI designed exclusively to keep the human race alive by any means necessary. Meet The Saviour, a man who claims that the AI has gone rogue and no longer serves its initial purpose, but others claim that he is delusional and the leader of an extremist group. Will you trust him? Will you trust the Watchers?
